1.3.0.en: Application has been completely rewritten, information is now updated in real time and will use less memory.

1.3.3.en: Add support for smart detections and fix some bugs

1.3.5.en: App crashes after motion or doorbell ring

1.4.0.en: Add support for UniFi Flood light

1.4.1.en: Some changes in the websocket lib and debug modus on (Test version)

1.5.4.en: Bugfix for crash when some camera's are not added to homey
